flavor_text: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.
X-ray photos were taken to check its body structure. Nothing appeared however.
There are researchers who believe this Pokemon reflected like a mirror in the distant past.
Ancient people believed that the pattern on BRONZOR's back contained a mysterious power.
